org.mokai.persist
Interface MessageStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMessageStore, JdbcMessageStore, MongoMessageStore
public interface MessageStore

Responsible of saving, updating and retrieving Messages. The persistent mechanism used is defined by the implementation.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary
 Collection<Message> list(MessageCriteria criteria)
          Retrieves the messages that matches the criteria.
 void saveOrUpdate(Message message)
          If the message is not persisted, it saves the messages, otherwise it updates the record.
 void updateStatus(MessageCriteria criteria, byte newStatus)
          Updates the status of all the messages that matches the criteria with the newStatus argument.
 

Method Detail

saveOrUpdate

void saveOrUpdate(Message message)
                  throws StoreException,
                         RejectedException
If the message is not persisted, it saves the messages, otherwise it updates the record.

Parameters:
message - the Message we want to save or update.
Throws:
StoreException - if something goes wrong.
RejectedException - if the message store refuses to save or update the message.

updateStatus

void updateStatus(MessageCriteria criteria,
                  byte newStatus)
                  throws StoreException
Updates the status of all the messages that matches the criteria with the newStatus argument.

Parameters:
criteria - the MessageCriteria used to match the messages.
newStatus - the new status for the messages.
Throws:
StoreException - if something goes wrong.

list

Collection<Message> list(MessageCriteria criteria)
                         throws StoreException
Retrieves the messages that matches the criteria.

Parameters:
criteria - the MessageCriteria used to match the messages.
Returns:
a Collection of Message objects that matched the criteria or an empty Collection.
Throws:
StoreException - if something goes wrong.
